description: This file is a JavaScript module that defines a client for interacting with a backend API. It includes functions to resolve the base URL for the backend, perform a health check request, and a placeholder for a prompt generation endpoint.
external_files: fetch API (built-in to browsers and environment)

methods.name: resolveBaseUrl(settings)
methods.description: Determines the backend base URL from provided settings object or defaults to 'http://localhost:3001'.

methods.name: healthCheck(baseUrl)
methods.description: Performs a GET request to the root endpoint of the backend to check if it is responsive, returning status and response details.

methods.name: generatePrompt()
methods.description: Placeholder function intended for generating prompts via backend API; currently throws an error as the endpoint is not yet implemented.
